mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE SELECT SENDER_EMPLOYEE_NO,RECEIVER_EMPLOYEE_NO,#{message},SYSDATE ,SENDER_EMPLOYEE_NO||RECEIVER_EMPLOYEE_NO||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmddhh24miss') FROM MESSAGE WHERE MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId}

INSERT INTO MESSAGE( MESSAGE_ID, RECEIVER_EMPLOYEE_NO, SENDER_EMPLOYEE_NO, MESSAGE_CONTENT, WRITE_DATE ) VALUES( #{senderemployeeNo}||#{senderemployeeNo}||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmddhh24miss'), (SELECT EMPLOYEE_NO FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMAIL=#{receiverEmail}), #{senderemployeeNo}, #{message}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT MESSAGE_CONTENT MESSAGE, (SELECT '[' || (SELECT TEAM_NAME FROM TEAM WHERE TEAM_ID = EMPLOYEE.TEAM_ID) || '] ' || EMPLOYEE_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMPLOYEE_NO = MESSAGE.SENDER_EMPLOYEE_NO) SENDER FROM MESSAGE WHERE MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId}

SELECT RECEIVER_EMPLOYEE_NO receiverEmployeeNo, SENDER_EMPLOYEE_NO senderEmployeeNo, MESSAGE_ID MESSAGEID, ( SELECT '[' || (SELECT TEAM_NAME FROM TEAM WHERE TEAM_ID = EMPLOYEE.TEAM_ID) || '] ' || EMPLOYEE_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMPLOYEE_NO = MESSAGE.SENDER_EMPLOYEE_NO) SENDER, MESSAGE_CONTENT message, WRITE_DATE WRITEDATE FROM MESSAGE WHERE RECEIVER_EMPLOYEE_NO = #{employeeNo} ORDER BY WRITEDATE DESC
